Name: Hydro Band
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Electric-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise.  You can get a Hydro Band at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Blasto-Claw, a Blasto-Card, and a Blasto-Seal. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
